ehi janathawa akhandawa dukpidawata pathwi sitina bawath, balayalath niladhari ha aandupaksha deshapalagnyayin wenaskam penwima nathara kalayuthu bawath, sinhala saha muslim janathawa wetha salakanawa men demala janathawata idam labadiya yuthu bawath demala jathika sandhanaya parlimenthu manthriwaru wana chals nirmalanadan, shiwasakthi aanandan, shanthi skandarasa saha palath sabha makthriwaru wana kandayiya shiwaneshan, ti.rawigaran, puwaneshwaran yanadin wisin illimak kara atha.
